title: 104-year-old Australian says "I want to die"
text:
104-year-old Australian says "I want to die" 7:51pm IST - 01:49
When Australian academic David Goodall turned 104-years-old last month, his wish was to die. Goodall, whose health has deteriorated in the last few years, is traveling to Switzerland to undergo voluntary euthanasia. Colette Luke has more. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
When Australian academic David Goodall turned 104-years-old last month, his wish was to die. Goodall, whose health has deteriorated in the last few years, is traveling to Switzerland to undergo voluntary euthanasia. Colette Luke has more.
